resources.string: Сhoose what was built later. Questions can be repeated until you score 20 points
Сhoose who was born later. Questions can be repeated until you score 20 points
"Level 1 passed! Göbekli Tepe is the oldest of the major megalithic structures in the world. Its age is estimated to be 12,000 years old, tentatively dating back to at least the 9th millennium BC."

"Level 2 passed! Zinoviy Bogdan Mikhailovich Khmelnitsky - hetman of the Zaporizhzhya Army, military leader, politician and statesman. The leader of the Cossack uprising, as a result of which the Zaporizhzhya Sich and the Left-Bank Ukraine with Kiev finally separated from the Commonwealth and became part of the Russian state.."
